name: caddy-jwt-blacklist
description: Unified JWT authentication and blacklist middleware for Caddy with Redis backend - integrates JWT validation with immediate token revocation
author: chalabi
features: Unified JWT authentication and blacklist checking
Redis-based token revocation with O(1) lookups
Multiple JWT signing algorithms (HS256, RS256, ES256, EdDSA, etc.)
JWK support with automatic key refresh
Multiple token source support (headers, query, cookies)
TLS Redis support for cloud deployments

integration.note: This plugin integrates JWT authentication functionality from ggicci/caddy-jwt with Redis-based blacklist management, providing a unified solution that eliminates the need for separate JWT auth plugins.
